com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.login

Class LoginConnectionConfig.ServerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.login.LoginConnectionConfig.ServerInfo
  • Enclosing interface:
    LoginConnectionConfig

    public static class LoginConnectionConfig.ServerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about available servers. A list of RDMServerInfo is used by an RDMLoginRefresh to list servers available for connecting to, and whether to use them as Standby servers.
    See Also:
    LoginConnectionConfig.ServerInfoFlags, LoginRefresh
